org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.jdbc.handlers
Class HandlerLifecycleManager

java.lang.Object
  org.wso2.carbon.repository.handlers.HandlerManager
      org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.jdbc.handlers.HandlerLifecycleManager

public class HandlerLifecycleManager
extends org.wso2.carbon.repository.handlers.HandlerManager

This class is used to manage handlers belonging to a particular lifecycle phase. There are three defined phases, default, reporting, and user.

Field Summary
static String COMMIT_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains the handlers that will get executed after a successful commit.
static String DEFAULT_REPORTING_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains all the reporting handlers (such as WS-Eventing & Notification handlers).
static String DEFAULT_SYSTEM_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains the default system-level handlers.
static String ROLLBACK_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains the handlers that will get executed after the rollback of a failed commit.
static String TENANT_SPECIFIC_SYSTEM_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains the tenant-specific system-level handlers.
static String USER_DEFINED_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains user-defined handlers.
static String USER_DEFINED_SYSTEM_HANDLER_PHASE
          This phase contains the tenant-specific system-level handlers.
 
Constructor Summary
HandlerLifecycleManager()
          Creates a Handler Manager for a given handler lifecycle phase.
